alert.note: Alert for Washtenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 3:18PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Wayne and northeastern Washtenaw Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 318 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Whitmore Lake to Salem to near Northville. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Northville around 325 PM EDT. Livonia around 330 PM EDT. Canton around 335 PM EDT. Ypsilanti around 340 PM EDT. Greenfield Village around 350 PM EDT. Romulus, Dearborn and Belleville around 355 PM EDT. Taylor and Downtown Detroit around 405 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Inkster, Melvindale, Redford, Plymouth, New Boston, Sumpter Township, Garden City, Barton Hills, Wayne and Westland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
